from django.urls import path, include
from .views import home, password_options, generated_password, about
urlpatterns = [
    path('', home, name='home'),
    path('password-options/', password_options, name='password-options'),
    path('generated-password/', generated_password, name='generated-password'),
    path('about/', about, name='about')
]

from django.db import models
class GeneratedPassword(models.Model):
    password = models.CharField(max_length=255)
    user_name = models.CharField(max_length=255)

from django.contrib import admin
from .models import GeneratedPassword
class GeneratedPasswordAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ('password', 'user_name')
admin.site.register(GeneratedPassword, GeneratedPasswordAdmin)

5.code:
from django.shortcuts import render
import markdown2

def convert(request):
    # Process the Markdown input and save it to a database model
    md_input = request.POST['markdown_input']
    converted_output = markdown2.markdown(md_input)
    return render(request, 'convert.html', {'converted': converted_output})
